short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Ingrediento! extracts recipe ingredients and seamlessly adds them to your shopping basket.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Extract ingredients from any recipe website with ease. Ingrediento! harnesses the AI capabilities of ChatGpt to instantly gather the necessary ingredients. Seamlessly add them to your preferred  shopping basket, simplifying your shopping experience.
